content.en: Algorithmic power optimization: Researchers have been investigating the use of algorithms to improve the efficiency and performance of power systems. These algorithms, such as the teaching-learning-based optimization algorithm, are being applied to various problems, including optimal power flow, economic dispatch, and load frequency control. The agency attributed to these algorithms is to optimize power network variables, solve multi-objective problems, reduce power losses, and handle the complexities of modern power systems.
content.da: Algoritmisk optimering af strøm: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer til at forbedre effektiviteten og ydeevnen af strømsystemer. Disse algoritmer, såsom den undervisnings-lærings-baserede optimeringsalgoritme, anvendes til forskellige problemer, herunder optimal strømfordeling, økonomisk fordeling og belastningsfrekvenskontrol. Begrundelsen bag disse algoritmer er at optimere variabler i strømmagnetværket, løse flerobjektive problemer, reducere strømtab og håndtere kompleksiteten i moderne strømsystemer.
